name: PlugandPlay
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Plug and Play can control different brands and types of smart devices via voice commands, such as lamps, switches, sockets, and humidifiers.

Users are required to bind Plug and Play to their Plug and Play accounts when they use Plug and Play at the first time. Meanwhile the Plug and Play account must have been added at least one smart device.

In order to obtain better control performance, please specify a clear name for each device in Plug and Play APP like “my lamp”, “my switch” and “kitchen light”.
